attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Mj600RFQGP3IOJgvgrt_desc
attribs.current: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Mj600RHFRGvNk2mSygG_desc
attribs.current: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Mj600RFQGP3IOJgvgrt_description
attribs.current: The Forebringer has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Mj600RHFRGvNk2mSygG_description
attribs.current: The Forebringer has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Mj6ToeVG2ao-LvT3j5c_description
attribs.current: If the Forebringer moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 + Proficiency Bonus Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-Mj6WP2gymff6IlZJ8RG_description
attribs.current: Leap up to 30 ft. and latch on to a target, restraining them until the end or your next turn and forcing them to make a DC 12 + Proficiency Bonus Strength saving throw and also be stunned.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-Mj7nYFgJ4IP5W3QlyMz_description
attribs.current: The Forebringer can make a number of attacks equal to your proficiency - 1
